schedule.title: Registration Starts
schedule.desc: Go to the south side of the IST to register
schedule.ext_desc: There should be a few people there with Kindles on a table. Use those. Yes, really.

schedule.title: Opening Ceremony
schedule.desc: We will introduce the competitions and officially start hacking
schedule.ext_desc: Meet upstairs in the IST Commons.

schedule.title: Lunch
schedule.ext_desc: We will be having Hungry Howie's! Go to the area labeled 'Food' on the map.

schedule.title: Team Building
schedule.desc: Need a team? We got you covered.
schedule.ext_desc: We will help you find a team member for your hack, or you could work alone, if you want.

schedule.title: Hacking Starts
schedule.ext_desc: Pick a spot somewhere in the areas labeled 'Hacking Space' and start working.

schedule.title: MVP Workshop
schedule.ext_desc: Minimal viable product presentation.

schedule.title: Catapult Tech Talk
schedule.ext_desc: This talk will cover the rules of entrepreneurship.

schedule.title: CESI Workshop
schedule.desc: Wokshop sponsored by Cole Engineering Services
schedule.ext_desc: More details will come later.

schedule.title: Git Workshop
schedule.ext_desc: This workshop will help guide you through your first time using git, or provide a refresher if you haven't used it in a while. The workshop will be presented by Greg W., one of the PolyHacks organizers.

schedule.title: Dinner
schedule.ext_desc: We will be serving Chick-Fil-A! It's in the same place as last time, just go to the area labeled 'Food' on the map. Don't be late!

schedule.title: Cup Stacking
schedule.ext_desc: Stack cups, have fun!

schedule.title: Android Workshop
schedule.desc: Learn the basics of using Android Studio
schedule.ext_desc: This workshop will help guide you through your first time using Android Studio, or provide a refresher if you haven't used it in a while. The workshop will be presented by Vamsi H., one of the PolyHacks organizers.

schedule.title: JS/React Workshop
schedule.desc: Learn the basics of using ReactJS
schedule.ext_desc: More details will come later.

schedule.title: Bubble Wrap
schedule.desc: The holy grail of all things stress-relieving
schedule.ext_desc: After thwarting off code-demons for hours on end, it's nice to sit back, relax, and pop as many bubbles as you can in some bubble wrap.

schedule.title: Midnight Snack
schedule.ext_desc: It will be in the same place as last time, just go to the area marked 'Food' on the map. There should really be a proper name for a midnight snack. Dreakfast? Brinner?

schedule.title: Paper Plane Comp.
schedule.desc: A throwback to your middle school days, but now you won't get in trouble for it.
schedule.ext_desc: Build your best flying machine from a standard piece of paper and let our judges critique it based on distance and style.

schedule.title: UAV Workshop
schedule.ext_desc: More details will come later.

schedule.title: Breakfast
schedule.desc: Sodexo breakfast sponsored by Florida Polytechnic
schedule.ext_desc: It will be in the same place as all other meals, go to the area marked 'Food' on the map.

schedule.title: Hacking Ends
schedule.ext_desc: Be sure to add your hack to devpost.

schedule.title: Lunch
schedule.ext_desc: Subway subs, anyone? Head to the area labeled 'Food' on the map to enjoy.

schedule.title: Closing Ceremony
schedule.ext_desc: We hope you had fun and hope to see you back next year!

announcements.title: Lost Items
announcements.desc: If you lose any items, they will be available to claim at the front desk (near where you signed in).

announcements.title: WolframAlpha API
announcements.desc: You can now access the WolframAlpha API by going to wolframcloud.com/access and using the code PolyHacksFL2017.

announcements.title: Lunch (Sponsored by Catapult)
announcements.desc: We are having Hungry Howie's! Make your way down to the area labeled 'Food' on the map.

announcements.title: Team Building
announcements.desc: Team building is at noon, if you don't have a team feel free to come!

announcements.title: Opening Ceremony
announcements.desc: Go to the main hacking area to see the Ceremony.
